Reviews.Title: Best investment ever
Reviews.Author: Dvoke1
Reviews.Content: After my son broke our last TV we decided to buy the screen protector, and it has saved our TV on a several occasions. Flat screens and toddler is a bad mixture.  I love this product greatest idea ever.

Reviews.Title: MASSIVE GLARE
Reviews.Author: P.S.
Reviews.Content: Great but can not have the light on at all in the room or the windows for some reason this thing has a enormous glare desire. It reflexes all light and not in a good way. Lame! but other than that it is perfect

ProductInfo.Features:
Thanks to Vizomax thousands of Americans enjoy their HDTV's in complete comfort. Protect your investment today!
Product of excellence - 100% Clear maintains High Definition picture. Unique design that keeps the protector unnoticeable
Enhanced protection designed with elegance that remains unnoticeable. Keeps the stylish look of your TV!
Fits all flat-screen TV's with screen diagonal from 63 - 65 inch.
Used by Families with children, Hotels, Schools, Hospitals and other institutions.
ProductInfo.Name: 63 - 65 inch Vizomax TV Screen Protector for LCD, LED & Plasma HDTV
